achievements.name: Continental Explorer: Sumeru Boscage
achievements.desc: Light up the maps of the following areas in Sumeru: Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.

achievements.name: Forest Roamer
achievements.desc: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in the following areas in Sumeru: Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.

achievements.name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Sumeru Boscage
achievements.desc: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in the following areas in Sumeru: Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.

achievements.name: Fluorescent Bloom
achievements.desc: Upgrade the Statues of The Seven in Sumeru to their maximum level.

achievements.name: Culmination of the Great Dream
achievements.desc: Reach the Max Level of the Tree of Dreams in Vanarana.

achievements.name: Woodland Guide
achievements.desc: Follow a total of 10 Seelie to their Seelie Courts in Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.

achievements.desc: Follow a total of 20 Seelie to their Seelie Courts in Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.

achievements.desc: Open a total of 100 treasure chests in Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.
